clues.text: You'll find Emma Watson in an unfinished work by her & Emma Woodhouse in a finished work by her

In 1996 its people voted to declare its independence day as July 3, 1944, the day Minsk was liberated from the Nazis

I, this man who made Britain a province during my reign as emperor, which ended in 54 A.D.
